text: Bottle Squad on a mission to save the day
Pint sized super heroes who love to play
Being a friend to everyone!
Bottle Squad with a Boom We're ready to Zoom
Bottle Squad
Five Little Ducks
“Aw! Look at the little duckies!! They’re so cute!”
“I bet the Mommy duck is teaching her babies to swim today!”

Five Little ducks went swimming today,
Under the bridge and far away,
Mommy duck said “Quack, Quack, Quack, Quack”
But no little ducks came swimming back.
“It looks like ducklings are missing!”
We have got to help!
“Ba-Ba-Boom! We’re ready to zoom!”

Five Little ducks went swimming today,
Under the bridge and far away,
Barkie said, “Bow wow! Bow wow!”
But only One little duck came swimming back.

Four Little ducks went swimming today,
Under the bridge and far away,
Bozzie said, “Rawr Rawr Rawr Rawr!”
But only one little duck came swimming back.

Three Little ducks went swimming today,
Under the bridge and far away,
Babbles said, “Me-ow! Me-ow !Me-ow ! Meow
But only one little duck came swimming back.

Two Little ducks went swimming today,
Under the bridge and far away,
Beans with her foot went “Thump! Thump! Thump!”
But only one little duck came swimming back.
“Guys! Over here!”
“I saw the trail of water leading to the well!
Looks like the duckling flew in and is stuck below!”
“It must be scared down there in the dark!
I’ll use my super bravery to fly down there and get it!”

One Little Duck went swimming today,
Under the bridge and far away,
Becca saved the last little duck
And brought her back to mama duck

Five little ducks are safely back 
With Mummy and Daddy Duck
They all went “Quack quack quack quack
Thank you for bringing us back
“If you need our help, you can count on us!
That’s our ba ba promise to you”!
